```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Section 1
```{r read-data}
crime <- read_csv(here::here("Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019 (2).csv"))
```

```{r}
murder <- crime %>% 
  filter(`Offence Subgroup` == "A11 Murder") %>% 
  group_by(Year) 
```

```{r}
ggplot(murder,
 aes(x = Year,
     y = `Incidents Recorded`)) +
  
 geom_line()
```
